entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-03-14
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • ViewCell Disappears when unfocused #5292
  • Vertical ProgressBar #5288
  • StackLayout IsEnabled Property does not work #5287
  • [Mac Catalyst] MAUI unable to connect with db EFCore #5284
  • Entry TextColor and BackgroundColor set through attached behaviour not updating on Windows #5281
  • WebView Navigated and Navigating events do not occur #5280
  • Shell: Navigation within a tab causes an error #5275
  • On screen keyboad #5272
  • Application.Current.OpenWindow(window) does not open a new window #5271
  • MAUI Sqlite doesn't work on Mac M1 Monterey #5269

Closed

  • BlazorWebView interaction with components #5237
  • Typescript support in Blazor apps #5264
  • [Windows] Wrong Slider default track color #4093
  • [WinUI]Crashing issue when minimizing the app window #5184
  • FillRule property not working in Polygon and Polyline #4054
  • Label bound to a slider fails to update after a button is clicked #5270
  • [Bug] ListView start freeze after few items are appearing #3001
  • CheckBox - Use default control templates for WinUI3 #5145
  • [Bug] Theme not applied to Switch control (Android) #2249

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix Blazor Hybrid page reloading for iOS #5291
  • Use Factory methods in DependencyInjection #5290
  • [samples] Add format example to DatePicker and TimePicker #5286
  • Call SetupDefault so that we have the right default Foreground TextColor for TimePicker #5285
  • [Windows] Fix issue updating dynamically Entry TextColor #5282
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, control-entry
  • Notify ISwitch.IsOn property changes if IsToggled changed #5276
    t/bug, control-switch

Merged

  • Fixing ALL doc warnings in MAUI #5250
    area/docs 📓
  • [iOS] Update DatePickerHandler and TimePickerHandler #3761
    t/bug, platform/iOS 🍎, area/controls 🎮, control-datetimepicker
  • CheckBox: use default style on WinUI 3 #5260
  • [Windows] Fix default Slider colors #5278
    area/controls 🎮, control-slider
  • [Windows] Fix ScrollView crash with incorrect values to Measure #5277
    t/bug, area/layout 🔲
  • [LOC_HB] checkin of localized string files #5244

Updated

  • Trimming Clean up #5028
    area/app-size 🤏
  • Fix some crashing tests & localization #5261
    t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • [controls] remove Linq usage and collection copying #5246
    area/perf 🏎️
  • Adds Tizen backend #2360
    area/setup 🪄, Future
  • Improve Glide usage for Image Loading on Android #5198
  • Implement LineBreakMode property in ButtonHandler #4664
    area/controls 🎮, control-button
  • Proposal - Replace internal use of MessagingCenter #3880
    area/perf 🏎️
  • [iOS] Implement VerticalTextAlignment property in Label #3714
    platform/iOS 🍎, area/controls 🎮, control-label
  • Fix ProjectReference for Controls targeting/runtime pack projects #3689
  • Async Cancellation For WebView #3681
    area/controls 🎮, control-webview
  • [Core] Implement BackgroundImageSource in PageHandler #3396
    area/controls 🎮, control-pages
  • Implement touch events in GraphicsView #3261
    t/enhancement ☀️, area/drawing ✏️
  • Improvements Droid Lifecycle #2669
    area/lifecycle 🔁, community ✨, 6.0.300-preview.14
  • More Source Generators #2501
  • Workload targets improvements (#1611) 2.0 #2011
    do-not-merge, area/setup 🪄
  • Add code tours for handlers and essentials #1712
    t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • Don't calculate routes on shell startup #5262
    area/shell 🐢
  • [android] Ensure toolbar is removed from parent before adding to appbar #5255
    platform/android 🤖
  • Fix Shapes Aspect property #5225
    area/drawing ✏️
  • [Windows] Fixes related with Clipping #5224
    platform/windows 🪟, area/drawing ✏️
  • Added embedding extensions #5218
  • RTL FlowDirection fix for Windows #5205
    area/layout 🔲
  • Implement Path RenderTransform property #5190
    area/drawing ✏️
  • Add IWindow.DisplayDensity #5185
  • Set the date after the DatePickerDialog is shown #5173
    control-datetimepicker
  • Move `WeakEventManager` to `Core.csproj` #5139
    area/architecture
  • [iOS] Fix TabbedPage colors in iOS 15 #5135
    platform/iOS 🍎, area/TabbedPage
  • [Windows] WebView not loading HtmlWebViewSource #5131
    platform/windows 🪟, t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/controls 🎮, control-webview
  • Add first iteration of default style theme #5111
    do-not-merge
  • Fix issue using LineBreakMode and MaxLines at the same time #5093
    t/bug, area/controls 🎮, control-label
  • Mark all the Device [Obsolete] #5088
  • BlazorWebView: Allow for WPF and WinForms WebView2 Custom Startup Settings and Fixed Distribution Mode #5086
    area/blazor 🕸️
  • Add Resource Dictionary Template #5052
    area/templates 📄
  • [GH-4958] Platform behavior implementation #5043
  • [dualscreen] project/nuget for Surface Duo and other Android foldables #5020
    area/controls 🎮, control-dualscreen
  • Remove FontImageExtension #5012
    area/Xaml </>, area/fonts 🅰️
  • Allow non-dot decimal separator in BindingExpression #5005
    area/Xaml </>, t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/localization
  • [iOS] Update SearchBar TextColor property if TraitCollection changes #5004
    platform/iOS 🍎, t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/controls 🎮, control-entry
  • Update WebAuthenticator sample package versions #4945
    area/essentials 🍞
  • [WIP] Enable Window Sizing #4942
    area/desktop 🖥️
  • [Android] Implement pending focus management logic in Handlers #4914
    platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮
  • [WIP] Rework use of ObtainStyledAttributes so we can enable `AndroidLinkResources` #4912
  • [iOS] Custom implementation in SearchBar IsEnabled property #4882
    platform/iOS 🍎, area/controls 🎮, control-entry
  • Add svg to default copied bundle items for mac/ios #4863
    6.0.300-preview.14
  • Fix Android crashing issue #4860
    platform/android 🤖, area/templates 📄, high
  • [iOS] Update Editor scroll position #4850
    platform/iOS 🍎, area/controls 🎮, control-entry
  • [Android] Implement custom WebChromeClient in WebViewHandler #4826
    platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮, control-webview
  • Add single target build ProjectCapability #4791
    area/single project ☝️, partner, 6.0.300-preview.14
  • [templates] add global.json to pin to .NET 6 #4767
    area/templates 📄
  • Scoping doc #4679
  • Implement Padding property in ImageButtonHandler #4665
    area/controls 🎮, control-button
  • Adding UWP-compatibility to ProgressBar #4653
    area/controls 🎮
  • Essentials.FilePicker WIP refactored to interface and singleton #4632
    area/essentials 🍞
  • Initial design doc around how Handler Resolution works #4392
  • [iOS] Add pending events and dismiss keyboard button to EditorHandler #4345
    platform/iOS 🍎, area/controls 🎮, control-entry
  • Implement InputView IsSpellCheckEnabled property #3729
    area/controls 🎮, control-entry
  • ZStackLayout #2115
    t/enhancement ☀️, area/layout 🔲
